backend/main.mo: Defines types and state maps for services, profiles, orders, and notifications, with admin‑gated service creation and user‑restricted profile access.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking frontend files to Internet Identity–based sign‑up and profile‑saving features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, describing structure, styling, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads Tidio chat script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router, routes, and theme provider, wrapping pages in BrandLayout and protecting selected routes with AuthGate.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows a loading spinner while Internet Identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Renders a branded footer with navigation links, contact info, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header component with navigation, mobile menu, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Demo OTP generator and verifier with input slots and validation UI.
frontend/src/components/ProductAddToCart: Product order section handling sample selection, form fields, auth gating, and add‑to‑cart mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProductOrderForm: Form fields for brand name and description with word counting.
frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSel: Grid selector for sample product images with highlighting of the selected option.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Simple service card displaying icon, name, pricing, delivery time, and optional action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances using identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Provides add‑to‑cart mutation and a query for fetching caller orders via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Derives authentication state and principal info from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderPayment.ts: Mutation hook to update order payment status and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches a list of services using react-query, enabled once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Provides mutations for submitting support requests and a query for fetching support requests with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Handles fetching and saving the caller's user profile via react-query with mutations for both full and basic profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom black‑and‑gold theme variables plus utility and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Displays a product page for Business Cards with details, banner, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a styled contact page with email and WhatsApp links and hover effects.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard combining services, support requests, profile data, and order handling with form logic and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, service listings, and navigation to product pages or dashboard based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with error handling and redirect on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LogoDesignPage.tsx: Displays the Logo Design product page with a banner, product description, and an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Shows order details and a mock payment flow, handling loading, missing orders, and navigation to the success page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Updates an order’s payment status to completed and displays a confirmation summary after payment.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoFramePage.tsx: Renders the Photo Frame product page with visuals, product info, and an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Fetches and displays service pricing cards and shows available payment options like Stripe and PayPal.
frontend/src/pages/ProductBannerPage.tsx: Shows the Product Banner page with imagery, description, and an add‑to‑cart module.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists available services with icons and lets users navigate to order, redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: React page handling Internet Identity login and a follow-up profile form to save full name and email before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them via sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides word-count–based description validation with a 1000-word limit and a helper to count words.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend design system.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and requirements for implementing an Internet Identity–based signup flow with profile storage.
